Package fr.cnrs.iees.versioning

Tools for the management of version numbers and library dependencies in a java project.

The version management system proposed here relies on ivy. It involves:

  • A class to increase the version number: VersionManager
  • A class to store the project-specific ivy dependencies: VersionSettings
  • A valid ivy setup, i.e. ivy.xml and build.xml files, that must be stored in a <project>/scripts directory

The GenerateVersionManager class will copy the VersionManager and VersionSettings classes in a new project. You will then need to edit VersionSettings and launch VersionManager to generate the proper ivy files for dependency management.

Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 18 mai 2021
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GenerateVersionManager
    A little helper to generate identical VersionManager.java files in a set of libraries.
